channel.title: Pk or not?
channel.description:
First time i've visited this site in a while >.>
Anyway, thinking of making a new release, just wanna make a quick poll.
Do you guys want a PK server or a normal Skilling server with PK in wildy?
...i think i put this in the wrong place, if so, mod please move to appropriate place :)

item.title: Pk or not?
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

DeltaScape, the game itself that people log in and play on, was a good server until it had so many resets, was good because it was all around. The pking was ok. The skilling was ok. The monster killing was good.

Read full topic

item.title: Pk or not?
item.dc:creator: @i_have_an_ax i have an ax
item.description:
@i_have_an_ax wrote:

THIS IS NOT RUNESCAPE DISCUSSION

This is not wbm land.

Read full topic

item.title: Pk or not?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

A server should be an all around server; it should concentrate on all aspects, rather than just one. This is why people get bored of servers so quickly, it’s because people either focus on PKing or just one aspect of the server too much.

Read full topic

item.title: Pk or not?
item.dc:creator: @Sunarpe Sunarpe
item.description:
@Sunarpe wrote:

[quote=“Coelho, post:2, topic:396589”]First of all, there is a way to make an actual poll…

Second of all, I don’t think there is a section for something like this (although I am recommending it/questioning why we don’t have it http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,493751.0.html).

Third of all, I don’t care what type it is as long as it isn’t crap.[/quote]

Yeah, I’ve made a real one, but I agree there should be a specific forum link for this stuff.

Just doing a little bit of research, ha.

Read full topic
